unbbayes.datamining.datamanipulation
Class Attribute

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--unbbayes.datamining.datamanipulation.Attribute
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class for handling an attribute.

Two attribute types are supported:

  • numeric:
      This type of attribute represents a floating-point number.
  • nominal:
      This type of attribute represents a fixed set of nominal values.

Version:
$1.0 $ (16/02/2002)
Author:
Mário Henrique Paes Vieira (mariohpv@bol.com.br)
See Also:
